mapper.sql: id , phone_num phoneNum, y, score, score_model_type scoreModelType, is_del isDel, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate
mapper.insert:
insert into data_mobile ( phone_num, y, score, score_model_type, is_del, create_date, update_date) values
( #{item.phoneNum}, #{item.y}, #{item.score}, #{item.scoreModelType}, 0, now(), now() )
